name: BSO
comment:
>>37766893

"S'alright." You nod. You can't help but feel a bit jealous. "That's what picking up a Gem feels like."

He looks at you like a deer caught in the headlights.

"Another one?" Ayla and Vision speak in unison, the former with curiosity, the second with anger.

"Yes, okay." Nel responds.

"Two Celestial Gems between you already..." Ayla sighs. "Liza didn't use many more than that to create her Artifact, though she and her guild have worked on it a lot since. You could definitely have something minor conjured up, or boost something you already have..."

"Let me see it." Vision nods, extending a hand toward Nel.

"I don't think that would be for the best." Ayla intervenes, standing in his way. He groans. It seems to upset him again.

"But I promise," Nel says. "The chest was empty when I got there. No weapons, not even a cred-chip. This thing was wedged in the damn ceiling. I couldn't help it, I had to..."

"We know, don't worry." Ayla says. "We'll talk about it later, alright?"

"Yeah, okay."

> [[ 1/2 ]]
